cause.description:
Well in many places throughout the nation (US) school districts are cutting funding and other forms of support to the fine arts and music programs. As well all know that there are countless studies out there that show that the average intelligence of a student of music is greater than the one without. I don't want you to donate money, but I do want you to vocalize your support in this cause widget.
COOL! passed the 100 mark! 6/12 1,500 8/4/07 2,000 8/23/07 3,000 9/10/07 4,500 10/6/07 5,000 10/16/07 6,000 10/31/07 7,500 11/20/07 10,000 1/15/08 11,000 2/14/08 13.000 5/20/08 14,000 6/24/08 16,000 8/22/08 17,000 9/10/08 21,000 10/27/08 28,000 12/6/08 35,000 2/12/09
1. Keep fine arts in our school systems!
2. Fine arts increase children's success in school
cause.mission: Bring life the kids in school, who need music!
cause.name: Keep fine arts in our schools!
